meta.title: CareMetrics - BI and Analytics for Dental Clinics, Focused on Treatment Quality
meta.description: CareMetrics gives you granular treatment and outcome data for follow-up—unlike most EHRs, which are economy-focused. Structure data, follow up on quality, improve your treatments. BI for practice and quality management—not a medical device.

hero.title: BI and Analytics for
hero.description: CareMetrics is built for treatment follow-up and quality—with granular outcome data that most EHRs don't provide because their data is economy-focused. Structure your treatment and outcome data, follow up over time, and get insights to improve your treatments.

features.title: What CareMetrics Offers
features.subtitle: Most EHRs are built around billing and economy; their data is rarely granular enough for treatment follow-up. CareMetrics is built for quality: granular treatment and outcome data, so you can follow up and improve your care.

dataValidation.title: Treatment & Outcome Follow-Up
dataValidation.description: Register episodes and record outcomes in one place. Spot episodes missing outcomes or incomplete follow-up (e.g. last 7 days or older than 30 days). Keep your follow-up data complete so your quality insights are reliable.

qualityScorecards.title: Quality Scorecards
qualityScorecards.description: Outcome-oriented metrics that matter: Retreatment rates (within 12 months), complication follow-up rates, recall compliance, and preventive vs operative ratios. Provider-level detail with trend analysis and benchmarking.

benchmarking.title: Multi-Clinic Benchmarking
benchmarking.description: Compare quality metrics and production KPIs across clinics. See how your clinic performs against group medians. Identify outliers and best practices. Essential for clinic chains and groups.

dashboards.title: Flexible Production & Activity Dashboards
dashboards.description: Fast-loading dashboards (< 2 seconds) with revenue by provider, visit volumes, treatment categories, and patient mix. Custom filters, mobile-friendly views, and export to CSV/PDF.

referrals.title: Referral & Collaboration Insights
referrals.description: Track referral flows, turnaround times, and specialist collaboration patterns. See which referrers send which types of cases and how volumes change over time.

security.title: Secure & GDPR-Compliant
security.description: Database-per-tenant isolation, encryption in transit and at rest, RBAC access control, and audit logs. Built for Swedish healthcare data protection requirements.

about.title: Why CareMetrics?
about.paragraph1: Most EHRs and journal systems are economy-focused: they capture what you bill, not the granular treatment and outcome data you need to follow up and improve your care. Production dashboards are useful, but they rarely support real treatment-quality follow-up.
about.paragraph2: CareMetrics is built for follow-up and improvement: granular treatment and outcome data that EHRs don't provide. Structure your episode and outcome data, see quality metrics like retreatment and complication follow-up, and use dashboards to compare over time—so you can make better decisions and improve your treatments.
about.paragraph3: Built for dental clinics, specialist clinics, and clinic groups in Sweden. CareMetrics is an analytics and reporting tool for practice and quality management; it is not a medical device or healthcare service.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Ready to see your clinic more clearly? Let's talk about how CareMetrics can help.
contact.description: CareMetrics is designed for private dental clinics, specialist clinics, and clinic groups that want to work more fact-based and document quality in a structured way.
contact.closing: See your clinic more clearly. Support better decisions with data. Show patients and staff that you work actively with quality.
